00057 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00058 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::init(const char * theName,
00059                             const char * theDesc,
00060                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00061   // Initializer:
00062 
00063   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00064   setDependent(dependent);
00065   initParameters();
00066 }
00067 
00068 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00070   // Sets the dependent variable:
00071   _dependent = &dependent;
00072   _gaussPolyn.setDependent(dependent);
00073   _gauss.setDependent(dependent);
00074 
00075   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00076 }
00077 
00078 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00079 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::initParameters() {
00080   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00081 
00082   _fracGP = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".gpFrac",
00083                           TString(GetTitle()) + " gpFrac",
00084                           0.5, 0, 1);
00085 
00086   _gaussPolyn.init(GetName() + TString(".gaussPolynPdf"), 
00087               GetTitle() + TString(" Gausss Polyn Pdf "), 
00088               *_dependent, 0 , 2);
00089   _gaussPolyn.gauss().b()->setVal(0);
00090   _gaussPolyn.gauss().s()->setVal(0.011);
00091 
00092   _gauss.init(GetName() + TString(".gauss"), 
00093               GetTitle() + TString(" Gauss"), 
00094               *_dependent);
00095   _gauss.b()->setVal(-0.1);
00096   _gauss.s()->setVal(0.018);
00097 }
00098 
00099 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00100 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::createPdf() {
00101 
00102   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00103   RooAddPdf * thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00104                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00105                           *_gaussPolyn.getPdf(), 
00106                           *_gauss.getPdf(),
00107                           *_fracGP);
00108 
00109   setPdf(*thePdf, kTRUE);
00110   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00111 }
00112 
00113 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00114 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::addComponents() {
00115   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00116   addComponent(_gaussPolyn);
00117   addComponent(_gauss);
00118 }
00119 
00120 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00121 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::linkParameters(BdkPdf2GPolyn & pdf2)
00122 {
00123   // Copies RRV pointers:
00124   _gaussPolyn.linkParameters(pdf2.gaussPolyn());
00125   _gauss.linkResolution(pdf2.gauss());
00126   _fracGP = pdf2.fracGP();
00127   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00128 }
00129 
00130 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00131 void BdkPdf2GPolyn::linkMeanVal(Bool_t lk ) {
00132   if( kTRUE == lk ) { 
00133     _gauss.linkResolution(_gaussPolyn.gauss().b());
00134     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00135   }
00136 }
